name: Tortle Name Generator
description: Shell yeah! Need a name for your totally tubular Tortle character? Our generator will have you shouting 'Cowabunga!' in no time. Get radical names for your heroes in a half-shell (or any Tortle, really).
introduction: So, you've got a Tortle character, huh? Awesome choice! But every righteous reptile needs a name that's as bodacious as they are. Stop shell-shocking yourself trying to come up with the perfect moniker. Our Tortle Name Generator is here to help you create a name that's totally gnarly!
howToUse: Marvel at the awesomeness of the Tortle name that appears.
Don't like it? Click 'Generate' again! We've got enough names to fill the sewers of New York City.
Copy and paste your favorite name into your character sheet, and get ready to party on, dude!

faqs.question: Are these names actually good?
faqs.answer: Good? They're shell-tastic! We've crafted these names with the perfect blend of Tortle-y goodness and a dash of radical attitude.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other reptile characters?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! While designed for Tortles, these names can work for any reptile character with a chill vibe.

faqs.question: Are the names generated randomly?
faqs.answer: Like a ninja vanishing into the shadows! We use a sophisticated algorithm (aka, a bunch of lists) to create names that are both unique and fitting.

faqs.question: Will these names help me win D&D?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee victory, a cool name is a great first step. Plus, you'll look super cool while you're rolling those dice.

faqs.question: Is this generator free?
faqs.answer: Totally free! Like pizza after a long night of fighting crime. Enjoy!

faqs.question: Can I suggest names to be added to the generator?
faqs.answer: Shell yeah! We're always looking for fresh ideas. Send your suggestions our way, and we might just add them to the mix.
